text: <@U7SL518D6> is there a way to change the scope of a local module to global? (= can't seem to find an option to do that). These modules are used in a hubl+html template.
<@U7SL518D6> thank you, also sorry but i just don't see an option to change scope...

You would need to change the “global” parameter as shown in that doc using <https://designers.HubSpot.com/docs/developer-reference/local-development-cms-cli|local dev> OR in the design manager with a <https://designers.HubSpot.com/docs/building-blocks/templates/drag-and-drop-templates|drag and drop template>, <https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/cms-general/use-global-content-across-multiple-templates#create-new-global-content-in-the-design-manager|convert to global>.
<@U7SL518D6> so, i'm using a hubl+html template... that's why i'm not seing that... are you saying maybe to create a temp dnd template for that purpose?

well the easiest way is using the local development tools. An easier way to create global content may come to the UI.

We build largely CMS CLI first, as that is generally the preferred environment for most developers. That way they can use their favorite code editors, and tools.

If you haven’t gone done it yet, I highly encourage going through our <https://designers.HubSpot.com/tutorials/getting-started|Quick Start tutorial> which within just a few minutes shows you how to set up the <https://designers.HubSpot.com/docs/developer-reference/local-development-cms-cli|CMS CLI> and start making changes within a HubSpot account.

<@U7SL518D6> yeah, it's on my backlog... thanks. So another quick thing just happened (= i see my templates in the design manager, but they are gone-not-found-anymore from the create new page on the website side...)
in your templates, do you have the annotation for `isAvailableForNewContent: true`?
Hello all, I'm Karthik from India. Working as a Web developer.
<@U7SL518D6> OMG... thank you (= but a swear i didn't changed that before)

The default when creating new templates is for it to be set to false. That’s to protect content creators working in your account from accidentally using a template you’re still working on before you’re ready for that.
